alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Platte County; South Laramie Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 04 at 4:00AM MDT until April 05 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow expected. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches. Winds could gust as high as 50 mph, producing near- blizzard conditions at times. * WHERE...Platte county including the city of Wheatland. The Central and Southern Laramie Range, including Interstate 80 between Cheyenne and Laramie. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing and drifting snow will significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Platte County; South Laramie Range
